hero.title: Discover Your Potential and Start Your Journey
hero.description: Through a precise personal assessment that covers various aspects of your life, we help you identify your strengths and development opportunities, and recommend the best resources for continuous growth.

step1.title: Evaluate Yourself
step1.description: Answer simple questions and learn more about your level in each axis.

step2.title: Get Your Results
step2.description: Once you finish the test, you get your results for each axis to know your strengths and weaknesses.

step3.title: Buy Books That Suit You
step3.description: We recommend books and resources that suit you based on your results, so you can develop yourself.

step4.title: Track Your Progress
step4.description: Track your progress in reading books, and know where you are in your development journey.

benefit1.title: Personalized Recommendations for You.
benefit1.description: Every test you take helps us know you better, and we can recommend books, skills, and next steps that will really benefit you.

benefit2.title: Continuous Progress Tracking
benefit2.description: We won't let you get lost! We see where you are, what you've completed, and make it easy for you to continue on the path that develops you.

benefit3.title: Fun and Motivating Experience
benefit3.description: Challenges, achievements, a supportive community, and an atmosphere that's never boring.

benefit4.title: Tangible Results
benefit4.description: In the end, everything you do will have weight... whether in your work or in your personal development.

suggestedBooks.title: Your Suggested Books
suggestedBooks.subtitle: Follow your reading progress with us

testimonials.title: Client Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from clients who started their journey and found a real difference in their lives after reading the suggested books.
testimonials.testimonial: Completely changed my way of thinking! Simple but effective steps in building strong habits.

footer.description: A smart platform that aims to accurately assess personal capabilities and provide personalized recommendations that help you develop yourself and achieve the best version of yourself through a continuous educational and developmental path.

evaluation.title: Evaluations
evaluation.suggestionsDescription: Based on your results, we suggest these books to help you develop yourself
evaluation.answerInstructions: Answer the questions, choose the degree that expresses how much the statements apply to you
